head.b:skin: /* styles */ @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Dancing+Script:wght@700&family=Ubuntu:wght@400;700&display=swap"); * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } html { scroll-behavior: smooth; height: 100%; } body { font-family: "Ubuntu", sans-serif; height: 100%; } ul, ol { list-style: none; } a { text-decoration: none; } .header__wrapper { max-width: 1400px; margin: 0 auto; display: flex; position: relative; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { .header__wrapper { max-width: 100%; padding: 0 16px; } } .wrapper { max-width: 1400px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 120px; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { .wrapper { max-width: 100%; padding: 0 16px; } } .head_title { width: 100%; margin-bottom: 60px; } .head_title h2 { font-size: 24px; text-transform: uppercase; position: relative; } .head_title h2::after { content: ""; position: absolute; height: 3px; width: 48px; background-color: #ffe259; bottom: -8px; left: 0; } /* header styles start */ header { position: fixed; left: 0; right: 0; top: 0; background-color: #222; box-shadow: 0 0 20px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7); padding: 5px 0; z-index: 2; } header .logo a { display: block; text-decoration: none; color: crimson; font-size: 40px; font-weight: 700; } header .menu ul { display: flex; align-items: center; list-style: none; } header .menu ul li { margin: 0 20px; } header .menu ul li a { display: block; color: #fff; text-decoration: none; text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 14px; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { header .menu { display: none; } } header .mobile_menu_container { display: none; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { header .mobile_menu_container { display: flex; position: fixed; background: #222; height: 100%; z-index: 3; left: 0; right: 0; top: -100%; align-items: center; justify-content: center; opacity: 0; pointer-events: none; transition: 500ms cubic-bezier(0.03, 0.95, 0.11, 1.09); } header .mobile_menu_container ul { list-style: none; text-align: center; } header .mobile_menu_container ul li { margin: 16px 0; } header .mobile_menu_container ul li a { display: block; text-decoration: none; color: #fff; font-size: 20px; } header .mobile_menu_container.active { opacity: 1; pointer-events: auto; top: 0; } } @media all and (max-width: 600px) and (max-width: 600px) { header .mobile_menu_container.active + .menu_close_icon { display: flex; z-index: 3; padding: 16px; background: #000; border-radius: 50%; margin: 4px; } } header .search_icon { cursor: pointer; } header .search_icon img, header .search_icon span { display: block; color: #fff; width: 30px; height: 30px; -webkit-user-select: none; -moz-user-select: none; -ms-user-select: none; user-select: none; pointer-events: none; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { header .search_icon { display: none; } } header .mobile_menu_icon { cursor: pointer; display: none; } header .mobile_menu_icon img, header .mobile_menu_icon span { display: block; color: #fff; width: 30px; height: 30px; -webkit-user-select: none; -moz-user-select: none; -ms-user-select: none; user-select: none; pointer-events: none; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { header .mobile_menu_icon { display: block; } } header .menu_close_icon { cursor: pointer; display: none; } header .menu_close_icon img, header .menu_close_icon span { display: block; color: #fff; -webkit-user-select: none; -moz-user-select: none; -ms-user-select: none; user-select: none; pointer-events: none; } header .search_container { position: absolute; right: 0; top: 24px; opacity: 0; pointer-events: none; transition: 400ms; } header .search_container.active { top: 40px; opacity: 1; pointer-events: auto; } header .search_container input[type=text], #BlogSearch2 input[type=text] { padding: 8px 24px; border: 0; outline: none; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); font-weight: 600; width: 200px; } table.gsc-search-box td.gsc-input { padding-right: 2px; } header .search_container input[type=submit], #BlogSearch2 input[type=submit] { border: 1px solid #ffe259; outline: none; padding: 8px 24px; background: #ffe259; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); font-weight: 600; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { header .search_container { display: none; } } /* header styles end */ /* spotlight styles start */ section#spotlight { height: 100vh; } section#spotlight .wrapper { background-color: #000; padding: 0 0; height: 100%; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { section#spotlight .wrapper { width: 100%; overflow: hidden; } } section#spotlight .wrapper .container { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; height: 100%; position: relative; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { section#spotlight .wrapper .container { display: block; height: 100vh; } } section#spotlight .wrapper .container .left { flex: 1; align-self: center; padding-left: 100px; } section#spotlight .wrapper .container .left .main__heading { color: #fcfcfc; font-family: "Dancing Script", cursive; font-size: 64px; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { section#spotlight .wrapper .container .left .main__heading { font-size: 48px; margin-bottom: 12px; } } section#spotlight .wrapper .container .left .main__subheading { color: #fcfcfc; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 24px; } section#spotlight .wrapper .container .left .button { display: inline-block; background-color: #ffe259; color: #000; text-decoration: none; padding: 8px 16px; font-size: 16px; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { section#spotlight .wrapper .container .left .button { width: 160px; text-align: center; } } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { section#spotlight .wrapper .container .left { height: 100%; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; padding-left: 32px; } } section#spotlight .wrapper .container .right { flex: 1; height: 100%; } section#spotlight .wrapper .container .right .img__container { height: 100%; } section#spotlight .wrapper .container .right .img__container img { display: block; height: 100%; width: 100%; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { section#spotlight .wrapper .container .right { position: absolute; right: 0; top: 0; height: 100%; width: 100px; } } /* spotlights styles end */ /* blog posts styles start */ section#blog_posts { padding: 100px 0 0; } section#blog_posts .wrapper .head_title { margin-bottom: 60px; } section#blog_posts .wrapper .blog_posts_list { list-style: none; } .post-outer { padding-bottom: 50px; border-bottom: 1px solid #bbafaf; padding-top: 80px; } .post-outer:first-child { padding-top: 0; } .date-outer { padding-bottom: 80px; } .post-outer .post_thumbnail { position: relative; } .post-outer .post_thumbnail .post_labels { position: absolute; top: 16px; left: 16px; background-color: #fcfcfc; padding: 8px 16px; border-radius: 10px; display: flex; align-items: center; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); } .post-outer .post_thumbnail .post_labels > img { width: 20px; height: 20px; margin-right: 10px; } .post-outer .post_thumbnail .post_labels a { text-decoration: none; color: #000; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 700; text-transform: uppercase; } .post-outer .post_thumbnail > img { width: 100%; height: 260px; -o-object-fit: cover; object-fit: cover; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { .post-outer .post_thumbnail > img { height: 220px; } } .post-outer h3 { font-family: "Dancing Script", cursive; font-size: 36px; margin: 42px 0 12px 0; } .post-outer h3 a { texr-decoration: none;color: #000;font-size: 36px; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { .post-outer h3 { font-size: 32px; margin-top: 24px; } .post-outer h3 a {font-size: 32px;} } .post-footer .post-footer-line-1 { font-size: 14px; background-color: #000; color: #fcfcfc; display: inline-block; padding: 4px 16px; margin-left: 24px; margin-bottom: 24px; } .post-footer .post-footer-line-1 a { color: #fcfcfc; font-size: 14px; display: inline-block; text-decoration: none; } .post-footer .post-footer-line-1 a abbr { text-decoration: none; } body.home_page .post-body, body.search_view .post-body, body.label_view .post-body { margin-bottom: 20px; line-height: 2; max-height: 180px; overflow: hidden; position: relative; } body.item_view .post-body { line-height: 2; } body.home_page .post-body p, body.search_view .post-body p, body.label_view .post-body p, body.item_view .post-body p{ margin-bottom: 20px; } body.home_page .post-body p:first-child, body.search_view .post-body p:first-child, body.label_view .post-body p:first-child { margin-bottom: 0; display: none; } body.home_page .post-body p:last-child, body.search_view .post-body p:last-child, body.label_view .post-body p:last-child, body.item_view .post-body p:first-child { margin-bottom: 0; } body.home_page .post-body::after, body.search_view .post-body::after, body.label_view .post-body::after{ content: ""; height: 100px; width: 100%; position: absolute; bottom: 0; background: rgb(255, 255, 255); background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgb(255, 255, 255) 0%, rgb(255, 255, 255) 48%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7) 77%, rgba(236, 252, 255, 0) 100%); } body.home_page a.read_more_button, body.search_view a.read_more_button, body.label_view a.read_more_button { display: block; position: absolute; bottom: 16px; z-index: 1; text-align: center; left: 0; right: 0; text-decoration: none; text-transform: uppercase; font-weight: 700; } .blog-pager { padding: 16px; box-shadow: 0 4px 13px -7px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); } .blog-pager a { text-decoration: none; color: crimson; } .blog-pager a:hover { text-decoration: underline; color: crimson; } /* blog post styles end */ /* popular posts styles start */ section#popular_posts { padding: 100px 0; } section#popular_posts .wrapper .container { width: 100%; box-shadow: 0 4px 13px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); padding: 32px; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { section#popular_posts .wrapper .container { box-shadow: unset; padding: 16px; } } section#popular_posts .wrapper .container .head_title { margin-bottom: 30px; } section#popular_posts .wrapper .container ul { display: flex; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { section#popular_posts .wrapper .container ul { flex-direction: column; } } section#popular_posts .wrapper .container ul li { flex: 1; margin: 0 8px; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { section#popular_posts .wrapper .container ul li { margin: 16px 0; } } section#popular_posts .wrapper .container ul li img { width: 100%; height: 160px; -o-object-fit: cover; object-fit: cover; } section#popular_posts .wrapper .container ul li .item-title a { display: block; font-family: "Dancing Script", cursive; font-size: 26px; margin-top: 16px; text-decoration: none; color: #000; } .PopularPosts .item-thumbnail { float: none; margin: 0; } /* popular posts styles end */ /* contact styles start */ section#contact { padding: 0 0 100px; } body.item_view section#contact { padding: 50px 0; } section#contact .wrapper .container { width: 100%; box-shadow: 0 4px 13px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); padding: 32px; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { section#contact .wrapper .container { box-shadow: unset; padding: 16px; } } section#contact .wrapper .container .head_title { margin-bottom: 30px; } section#contact .wrapper .container form { display: flex; flex-direction: column; } .contact-form-widget { max-width: 100%; } .contact-form-name, .contact-form-email, .contact-form-email-message { padding: 16px 24px; font-family: "Ubuntu", sans-serif; margin-bottom: 10px; outline: none; max-width: 100%; border: 1px solid #989898; } .contact-form-button-submit { background: crimson; color: #000; width: 150px; height: 42px; padding: 8px 24px; border: none; outline: none; font-weight: 700; font-size: 16px; cursor: pointer; } .contact-form-button-submit:hover { opacity: .8; color: #000; border: none; outline: none; background: crimson; } /* contact styles end */ /* footer styles start */ footer { background: #000; color: #fcfcfc; padding: 36px; } footer a { color: #fcfcfc; text-decoration: none; } footer a:hover { text-decoration: underline; } footer .wrapper .container { display: flex; justify-content: space-around; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { footer .wrapper .container { flex-direction: column; } } footer .wrapper .container .left { align-self: center; } footer .wrapper .container .left .logo a { display: block; text-decoration: none; color: crimson; font-size: 40px; font-weight: 700; } footer .wrapper .container .center ul { list-style: none; margin-top: 16px; } footer .wrapper .container .center ul li { margin: 12px 8px; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { footer .wrapper .container .center { text-align: center; margin-top: 60px; margin-bottom: 60px; } } footer .wrapper .container .right .social_icons { list-style: none; margin-top: 20px; background: rgb(32, 32, 32); padding: 10px; max-width: 260px; border-radius: 10px; display: flex; align-items: center; } footer .wrapper .container .right .social_icons li { margin: 0px 15px; } footer .wrapper .container .right .social_icons li a { display: block; } footer .wrapper .container .right .social_icons li a img, footer .wrapper .container .right .social_icons li a svg { display: block; width: 50px; height: 50px; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { footer .wrapper .container .right .social_icons { margin: 20px auto; margin-bottom: 60px; } } footer .wrapper .container .right p { margin-top: 20px; } footer .wrapper .container .right p a { color: crimson; } footer .wrapper .container .right p a:hover { text-decoration: none; } @media all and (max-width: 600px) { footer .wrapper .container .right { text-align: center; } } /* footer styles end */ /* hidden elements */ .blog-feeds {display: none;} .post-body .separator:nth-of-type(1){ display: none; } /* status message */ .status-msg-wrap { margin: 10px auto; margin-bottom: 50px; font-size: 100%; } .status-msg-wrap .status-msg-body { background: #fff; padding: 16px; box-shadow: 0 4px 13px -4px rgba(0,0,0, 0.2); } .status-msg-wrap .status-msg-body a { color: crimson; text-decoration: none; } .status-msg-wrap .status-msg-body a:hover { color: crimson; text-decoration: underline; } .status-msg-wrap .status-msg-border { height: 50px; }/* comments styles start */.comments { margin-top: 50px;}.comments h4 { font-size: 20px; padding: 16px 0;}.comments a { color: crimson;}.comments .comments-content .comment-thread ol:first-child { box-shadow: 0px 4px 8px -2px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); padding: 30px 20px; margin: 32px 0;}@media all and (max-width: 600px) { .comments .comments-content .comment-thread ol:first-child { box-shadow: unset; padding: 30px 0; }}.comments .comment-block { border-radius: 0px 16px 16px 16px; border: 1px solid #d8d8d8;}.comments .comments-content .comment-header { background: #464646; color: #fff; padding: 10px 24px; border-top-right-radius: 16px; }.comments .comments-content .comment-header a { color: #fff; text-decoration: none;}.comments .comments-content .comment-header .datetime a { font-size: 16px; color: #eee;}.comments .comments-content .comment-content,.comments .comments-content .comment-actions { padding: 16px 24px;}.comments .comments-content .comment-actions a { dispaly: inline-block; padding: 8px 16px; text-decoration: none; min-width: 100px; background: crimson; color: #000; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; margin-right: 8px; margin-bottom: 20px;}.comments .comments-content .comment-replies .continue a { display: inline-block !important; padding: 8px 16px; text-decoration: none; min-width: 100px; background: crimson; color: #000; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; margin-top: 16px;}.comments .comments-content .comment-actions a:hover { text-decoration: none;}/* comments styles end */
